questions.question: When the man and woman in the picture were discussing ice cubes, why did they notice Superman behind them?
options: Because Superman slammed the door with a loud noise.
Because Superman made a sound when he stepped on the wooden floor.
Because Superman made too much noise while eating.

reasoning_steps.evidence: Superman just turned around and took a step.
Superman made a sound when he stepped on the wooden floor.
reasoning_steps.inference: Because Superman made a sound when he stepped on the wooden floor.

questions.question: Among the following events, in the actual chronological order, which one happened third?

reasoning_steps.evidence: At 2:08, Superman snatched the child's kite earlier.
At the 2:10 mark, the man says he feels stuck.
the third event that Superman is eating a sandwich.
